sentence.Network_en: The road makes several abrupt turnings.
And somewhere along the road we took different turnings.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过在人生道路上某个地方我们分道扬镳了.

sentence.Network_en: Looking at left, right, and front, love will comes after several turnings.
sentence.Network_cn: 向左向右向前看, 爱要拐几个弯才来.

entry.def: If you take a particular turning, you go along a road which leads away from the side of another road.

example.ex: Take the next turning on the right.

auth_sentence.content: After a number of wrong turnings they found their bearings.
auth_sentence.res_content: After a number of wrong turnings they found their bearings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: After a number of wrong turnings they found their bearings.

auth_sentence.content: At times my life seems nothing but a series of regrets, of wrong turnings.
auth_sentence.res_content: At times my life seems nothing but a series of regrets, of wrong turnings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: At times my life seems nothing but a series of regrets, of wrong turnings.

auth_sentence.content: We are left with a sorrowful sense of wrong turnings taken, never to be retraced.
